name: frakto/php-coding-standards
description: PHP_CodeSniffer rules (sniffs) to enforce Frakto coding conventions

scripts-descriptions.lint: Lint PHP files against parse errors.
scripts-descriptions.check-cs: Run the PHPCS script against the entire codebase.
scripts-descriptions.fix-cs: Run the PHPCBF script to fix all the autofixable violations on the codebase.
scripts-descriptions.run-tests: Run all the unit tests for the Frakto Coding Standards sniffs without code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.coverage: Run all the unit tests for the Frakto Coding Standards sniffs with code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.check-complete: Check if all the sniffs have tests.
scripts-descriptions.check-complete-strict: Check if all the sniffs have unit tests and XML documentation.
scripts-descriptions.check-all: Run all checks (lint, phpcs, feature completeness) and tests.
